resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
education.description: Develop a capstone project entitled 'Marilenews Mobile App', A mobile application which helps our municipalities to disseminate information easily in real time. The application features show the latest news, traffic update, weather forecast, job posting, events and any other related information provided by our municipalities.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Worked on a web tool of a game that is built to react. Responsible for fixing reported issue and feature request on JIRA, and doing code review committed by other developers.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Worked on a social networking site that cater a specific audience. Handle the development of the project, including the database design and release notes for the deployment to production. Participate in a weekly meeting with our head to demonstrate the update of the application.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Handle different kind of internal and external project which was built using some of the latest tech stack in the web development. Participate on a scrum meeting to discuss the project manager about the status of the project. Responsible for the development and deployment of the project.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
